project_name.title: Project Name:
project_name.text:
Please enter a human readable name for your new project.
 Spaces and punctuation are allowed.

repo_name.title: Repository Name:
repo_name.text:
Please enter a directory name for your new project repository.
 Alphanumeric characters, hyphens and underscores are allowed. Lowercase is recommended.

python_package.title: Python Package Name:
python_package.text: Please enter a valid Python package name for your project package. Alphanumeric characters and underscores are allowed. Lowercase is recommended. Package name must start with a letter or underscore.
